Gumdrop
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
    IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler
    Handler interfaces for the IMAP server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox
    Mailbox storage abstraction for mail access protocols.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.index
    Message indexing system for fast IMAP SEARCH operations.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.maildir
    Maildir format mailbox implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.mbox
    Mbox file format mailbox implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
    POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler
    Handler interfaces for the POP3 server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler
    SMTP server handler interfaces.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap 
    Class Description
    MailboxFactory
    Factory interface for creating mail store instances.
    SearchCriteria
    Search criteria for IMAP SEARCH command (RFC 9051 Section 6.4.4).
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler 
    Class Description
    Flag
    Enumeration of standard IMAP message flags.
    Mailbox
    Interface for accessing mailbox contents.
    MailboxAttribute
    Enumeration of IMAP mailbox attributes.
    MailboxFactory
    Factory interface for creating mail store instances.
    MailboxStore
    Interface for a mail store containing multiple mailboxes.
    MessageSet
    Represents an IMAP message set (sequence set or UID set).
    SearchCriteria
    Search criteria for IMAP SEARCH command (RFC 9051 Section 6.4.4).
    StoreAction
    Enumeration of IMAP STORE command actions.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox 
    Class Description
    Flag
    Enumeration of standard IMAP message flags.
    IMAPMessageDescriptor.Address
    Email address structure.
    IMAPMessageDescriptor.BodyStructure
    MIME body structure for a message or part.
    IMAPMessageDescriptor.Envelope
    Message envelope containing parsed RFC 2822 headers.
    Mailbox
    Interface for accessing mailbox contents.
    MailboxAttribute
    Enumeration of IMAP mailbox attributes.
    MailboxStore
    Interface for a mail store containing multiple mailboxes.
    MailboxStore.Quota
    Quota information for a quota root.
    MessageContext
    Context providing access to message data during search evaluation.
    MessageDescriptor
    Interface describing a message in a mailbox.
    MessageSet
    Represents an IMAP message set (sequence set or UID set).
    MessageSet.Range
    A range within a message set.
    SearchCriteria
    Search criteria for IMAP SEARCH command (RFC 9051 Section 6.4.4).
    StoreAction
    Enumeration of IMAP STORE command actions.
